name: qb laboratory
description:
Visit the quanty bandit laboratory, interact with our equipment, talk to our agents or other visitors and unlock the door to the Maskotios study room. 

Maskotios are small creatures living in electromagnetic waves discovered in 2020 by the quanty bandit laboratory. Even though we've been hard at work studying them, there is still so much to discover...

Play with them in our new Twitch connected game, Maskonauts: Chat'Attack, available now on Steam and Google Play.
